contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Non-profit | Non-profit_name = November Coalition | Non-profit_logo = [[Image:November Coalition logo.jpg|200px]] | Non-profit_type = | founded_date = 1997 | founder = Nora Callahan | location = [[Colville, Washington]] | origins = | key_people = Martha Christman,Tom Murlowski | area_served = [[United States]] | focus = Ending War on Drugs, protect prisoners' rights | method = | revenue = | endowment = | num_volunteers = | num_employees = | num_members = | owner = | Non-profit_slogan = | homepage =[http://www.november.org/ November.org] | dissolved = | footnotes = }} [[Image:Seattle Hempfest 2007 - 117.jpg|thumb|November Coalition booth at 2007 [[Seattle Hempfest]].]] The '''November Coalition''' is a non-profit grassroots organization, founded in 1997, which fights against the [[War on Drugs]] and for the rights of the [[prison]]ers incarcerated as the effect of that war. It publishes a bulletin called ''Razor Wire''. ==Tyrone Brown== The November Coalition was involved in the advocacy for [[Tyrone Brown]]'s release.<ref>[http://stopthedrugwar.org/chronicle/465/tyrone_brown_life_in_prison_for_dirty_UA_campaign_to_free_him_grows Feature: Clamor Grows for Freedom for Texas Marijuana Prisoner Tyrone Brown] Drug War Chronicle</ref> Brown, an [[African American]] Texan, has been sentenced to [[life imprisonment]] for smoking [[cannabis (drug)|marijuana]]. On March 9, 2007, Governor [[Rick Perry]] signed a conditional pardon which released Brown under supervision.<ref>[http://www.november.org/thewall/cases/brown-ty/brown-ty.html Tyrone Brown is free at last] November Coalition</ref> == See also == * [[Prisoners' rights]] * [[War on Drugs]] * [[Drug Policy Alliance]] * [[Students for Sensible Drug Policy]] * [[National Organization for Reform of Marijuana Laws]] * [[Marijuana Policy Project]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.november.org/ Official website] {{Drug policy}} [[Category:Penal system in the United States]] [[Category:Cannabis legal reform organizations based in the United States]] [[Category:Non-profit organizations based in Washington (state)]] [[Category:Organizations established in 1997]] [[Category:Prison-related organizations]] {{US-org-stub}}
